column5: awesome fish....looks like you guys were at the BAR
Beautiful fish and even nicer looking lake Mike.  Are there ouananiche in that lake? My fuzzy memory is telling me yes.

[quote nam.  e=carll2' date='25 April 2010 - 11:16 PM' timestamp='1272251813' post='459768] awesome fish....looks like you guys were at the BAR    Yes Carl that is the Sand Bar.A dead giveaway with Owls Head Ski Resort in the background.For now on I will go there on sunday at least 80% less boat traffic I was told by the locals
That's a really nice fish Mike, congrats to you!
Way to go, Mike.  Love that chunky lookin lake trout.

Nice laker for sure Mike Looks like you are freezing on the first pic compared to the young lad on the last pic.... must be old age LOL Awesome way to start the season Congrats and thanks for sharing Jacques

Actually Jacques it was very cold Sunday morning forgot my tuque in the van. Found some hand warmers in my box and I was using them.That fish was caught at 7am it was still quite chilly at that time.  In the afternoon it warmed up a little.We jigged for some perch to keep the young lad happy. The protected bays were warm when we returned to the launch at 3pm I had gone back to a t-shirt.  Was a great day.Thanks for the kind words.MTP
Nice Laker Mike but tell me how much did you pay Ryan so you could hold his fish LOL
Nice fish Mike.  Same with the lake, whatta a backdrop for the photos.  Nice!!!
